name: TurboVector
description:
A turn-based racing roguelike game made for the 2023 7DRL jam!

******************************

Controls:

Numpad 1-9 or QWEASDZXC - Select movement option.

******************************

Movement mechanics are based on https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Racetrack_(game)

Movement options indicated in red will result in a collision.

Avoid collisions; when your vehicle damage reaches 100%, it will be destroyed.

Collisions may result in oil slicks. When you start a turn on an oil slick, your movement options will be decreased.

If you leave the track, you may miss a checkpoint. You will be alerted to return to the missed checkpoint, which will be indicated on the track in green.
